Texts.Eng:
Hyper-advanced machines.
    
 Diet: Robotic 
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 ^green;-97^reset;% Hunger Rate 
 +^green;30^reset;% Energy, +^green;5^reset;% Speed
 Resist: ^green;25^reset;% Physical, ^green;30^reset;% Ice, ^green;50^reset;% Poison, ^green;50^reset;% Radiation
 Immune: Cold, Snow, Ice, Slush, Poison, Breath
 
 ^orange;Environment^reset;: 
 -^red;50^reset;% Energy Regen On hot biomes
 ^green;25^reset;% Energy Regen on cold biomes
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;: 
 Shield: Perfect Blocks increase Energy
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 -^red;50^reset;% Energy when Electrified
 Weak: -^red;100^reset;%Electric
